numbered_ace_sentences: 1. In all graphs, less than 50% of head coaches are People of Color.
2. The Women’s National Basketball Association is a basketball league.
3. The National Basketball Association is a basketball league.
4. In the Women’s National Basketball Association, the proportion of Players of Color is greater than 75%.
5. In the National Basketball Association, the proportion of Players of Color is greater than 75%.
6. In Major League Baseball, the proportion of Players of Color is less than 50%.
7. I wonder why Major League Baseball is the only league with less than 50% of Players of Color.
8. I wonder why the basketball leagues are the only leagues with more than 75% of Players of Color.
9. I wonder why the proportion of Head Coaches of Color is low.
10. I am a member of a community of People of Color.
11. Representation of People of Color is important to my community.
12. A lack of representation of People of Color can make Children of Color hesitant to become professional athletes.
13. A lack of representation of People of Color can make Children of Color think that they cannot be athletes.
14. Because of this, Children of Color may choose a different profession.
15. The graph describes the proportion of Players of Color in various major sports leagues.
16. The graph also describes the proportion of Head Coaches of Color in various major sports leagues.
17. The headline is: Lack of Diversity in Major Sports Leagues.
